author: Veronica Dagher
title: Two Ways You Can Appeal for More College Financial Aid
text:
Although college-decision day for most high-school seniors was May 1, there could still be time to negotiate a better financial-aid package.
Returning college students can request more aid, too, if they are unsatisfied with their offer.
A change in a family’s financial situation and something known as “summer melt,” in which high-school students...
